text: Hey I am trying to add a field group to my custom module using Design Manager but the field group (despite being identical to other field groups in the menu) is not showing up in the content editor.

All the fields are in a drop-down menu and all the other fields are still showing up. I cloned one of the existing fields so it should just add my field to the dropdown, but it isn't. Makes me wonder if there is some setting or checkbox I am missing somewhere.
Hi Cassandra it really depends on what you are trying to accomplish. Do you want all the forms to have the same look or will you have custom forms?
Hi John is your field group a repeater?
A pic of the groups along side the code would help also.
Hey sorry
I'll get that for you
The field group is not a repeater
it has a display condition that it be selected from the drop-down menu--the same display condition all the other items in the drop-down have
Can you show me the condition for the one showing and the one not
It is hard to get a picture of what is going on without seeing the whole scope of the setup
And all the other fields and field groups in the drop-down now have their conditions set up the same way
This one is setup to pop_up_button where is the code for your other one?
which field did you clone that isn’t showing?
I cloned the Button field group to make the Pop-Up Button field group
I sent you the conditions for both
Ok just making sure it was the group not showing not a field within.
Let me recreate this real quick
Thanks!
John could you show my all the code included in this section
Just want to make sure I’m not missing something simple here.
Perfect thanks
When I pasted it I noticed the pop up button was commented out. I take it that you done that intentionally?
I really can’t see anything wrong with this.
yeah because the button is supposed to launch the JS
but that's not really the issue I need help with
I am just curious why this Field Group is not showing up in the menu dropdown in the Content Editor
Yea that is strange

Our Design Manager has gotten pretty crazy and unorganized over the last 7-8 years. Does anyone know of a tool or app that helps clean up and organize HubSpot Design Manager?

Any suggestions are greatly appreciated!

Hi everyone! I am having some issues with nav bar width and alignment here — not full page width and doesn't properly adjust to screen size: <https://hub.arender.io/en>
Any ideas on how to rectify?
